meanings.sent1: The telic plan ensured we reached our destination on time.
meanings.sent2: The telic nature of the project made it clear what needed to be achieved.
meanings.sent3: His telic approach to gardening resulted in a beautifully organized backyard.
meanings.sent4: The telic focus of the team was like a laser beam, cutting through distractions.
meanings.sent5: The telic goal of the puzzle was to find the hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: Directed towards a goal or outcome
meanings.sent1: The telic strategy helped us stay on track towards our objective.
meanings.sent2: Her telic mindset kept her focused on the end result.
meanings.sent3: The telic squirrel diligently gathered nuts for the winter ahead.
meanings.sent4: The telic river flowed steadily towards the sea, never losing sight of its destination.
meanings.sent5: The telic marathon runner had his eyes set on the finish line from the start.

meanings.sent1: The telic decision to study abroad was driven by a desire for new experiences.
meanings.sent2: Their telic actions demonstrated a clear intent to improve the community.
meanings.sent3: The telic cat carefully planned its route before pouncing on the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her telic gaze towards the horizon hinted at a deep longing for adventure.
meanings.sent5: The telic architect envisioned a building that would stand the test of time.
